snippet: Syria’s Alawites and other minorities who have aligned themselves with Bashar al-Assad could face retaliatory massacres.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Simon Adams, executive director of Global Center for the Responsibility to Protect, warns of very real possibility that Syria's Alawites and other minorities who have aligned themselves with Pres Bashar al-Assad could face retaliatory massacres; urges outside governments that have committed themselves to ending Syrian war to make clear that their assistance depends upon strict adherence to international humanitarian law.
lead_paragraph: Syria’s Alawites and other minorities who have aligned themselves with Bashar al-Assad could face retaliatory massacres.
